subject: May Almighty God bless you and
body:
May Almighty God bless you and your entire family give you wisdom and
knowledge to use this fund according to my wish and wish of Almighty
God to those less privilege .I made this deposit in London-England and
now that I cannot do anything in life I do not want the bank to
confiscate the fund since they have been using the fund for their own
business that is why I prayed to the Almighty God to review to me
someone honest and pity who will use the fund according to my wish. I
donâ€™t want to hand the project to the government I prefer an
individual who will reach out to the less privilege. This is my reason
for contacting you not by mistake but by divine direction.
Due to the state of my health my doctors does not allow me to make use
of any phone they only give me access to my laptop which I use once in
a while. So,we can always communicate by email.
From the total fund, you will use 20% as gratification while 80%
should go to the less privilege but if you feel otherwise do not
hesitate to notify me.
I will need your passport or any identification document. As soon as I
receive your passport or any identification document I will have no
doubt that you are genuine and ready to work with me thus I shall
refer you to the British bank.
Find attached copies of my photos.
Most cordially,
Mrs.Janet Robertson

subject: Re: May Almighty God bless you and
body:
Hello Robertson,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm deeply moved by your story and your desire to help the less privileged. It's truly admirable that even in your current state, you're thinking of others.

I have a few questions if you don't mind. Could you please share more about the project? What kind of assistance do the less privileged need? And how can I be of help?

Regarding the passport or any document, I'm afraid I can't provide them due to privacy reasons. However, rest assured that my intentions are genuine and I'm ready to assist in any way possible.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles
